Available moves:
- LEFT → (3,4) is our own body → death  
- UP   → (4,5) is free  
- DOWN → (4,3) is free  
- RIGHT→ (5,4) is free  

Apple distances (Manhattan):
• (5,0): |4–5|+|4–0| = 1+4 = 5  
• (3,8): |4–3|+|4–8| = 1+4 = 5  
• (7,1): 3+3 = 6  
• (9,0): 5+4 = 9  
• (2,9): 2+5 = 7  

The two closest apples are at (5,0) and (3,8). Moving UP toward (3,8) keeps us away from the enemy on the left and steers us clear of walls. It also opens up future left moves once we climb.

Strategy for next turns: Continue north toward the apple at (3,8). Once we clear our vertical path, pivot west to grab it, then consider the (5,0)/(7,1) cluster.

Next move: UP
